com.ibm.disni.verbs

类 IbvSendWR

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.disni.verbs.IbvSendWR
  • 直接已知子类:
    NatIbvSendWR

    public class IbvSendWR
extends Object
    Represent a send work request. Applications create work request and post them onto queue pairs for execution. Each work request is composed of several scatter/gather elements, each of which referring to one single buffer.

    • 嵌套类概要

      Unsupported.
      static class  IbvSendWR.IbvWrOcode 
      static class  IbvSendWR.Rdma
      Specifies the remote buffer to be used in READ or WRITE operations.
      static class  IbvSendWR.Ud
      Unsupported.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getWr_id

        public long getWr_id()
        A unique identifier for this work request. A subsequent completion event will have a matching id.
        返回:
        the wr_id

      • setWr_id

        public void setWr_id(long wr_id)
        Allows setting the work request identifier. A subsequent completion event will have a matching id.
        参数:
        wr_id - the new wr_id

      • getSg_list

        public LinkedList<IbvSge> getSg_list()
        Gets the scatter/gather elements of this work request. Each scatter/gather element refers to one single buffer.
        返回:
        the sg_list

      • getSge

        public IbvSge getSge(int index)
        Gets a specific scatter/gather element of this work request.
        返回:
        the sg element

      • setSg_list

        public void setSg_list(LinkedList<IbvSge> sg_list)
        Sets the scatter/gather elements of this work request. Each scatter/gather element refers to one single buffer.
        参数:
        sg_list - the new sg_list

      • getNum_sge

        public int getNum_sge()
        The number of scatter/gather elements in this work request.
        返回:
        the num_sge

      • setNum_sge

        public void setNum_sge(int num_sge)
        Unsupported.
        参数:
        num_sge - the new num_sge

      • getOpcode

        public int getOpcode()
        Returns the opcode of this work request. A opcode can be either IBV_WR_RDMA_WRITE, IBV_WR_SEND, or IBV_WR_RDMA_READ.
        返回:
        the opcode

      • setOpcode

        public void setOpcode(int opcode)
        Returns the opcode of this work request. A opcode can be either IBV_WR_RDMA_WRITE, IBV_WR_SEND, or IBV_WR_RDMA_READ.
        参数:
        opcode - the new opcode

      • getSend_flags

        public int getSend_flags()
        Gets the send flags for this work request. Unsupported.
        返回:
        the send_flags

      • setSend_flags

        public void setSend_flags(int send_flags)
        Sets the send flags for this work request. Unsupported.
        参数:
        send_flags - the new send_flags

      • getImm_data

        public int getImm_data()
        Unsupported.
        返回:
        the imm_data

      • setImm_data

        public void setImm_data(int imm_data)
        Unsupported.
        参数:
        imm_data - the new imm_data

      • getRdma

        public IbvSendWR.Rdma getRdma()
        Gets the RDMA section of of this work request. The RDMA part is required for one sided-operations such as IBV_WR_RDMA_WRITE, or IBV_WR_RDMA_READ.
        返回:
        the rdma

        public IbvSendWR.Atomic getAtomic()
        Unsupported.

        the atomic
